titleInfo.title: General Dickinson Inspects Air Center Examinations

mods.accessCondition: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law. mods.abstract: General and Mrs. Jacob MacGavock Dickinson inspecting the Nashville Army Air Center. They are inspecting charts located in the Psychological Research Unit. Several cadets are seated in the foreground.

Photograph showing General and Mrs. Jacob McGavock Dickinson visiting the Nashville Army Air Center located in Nashville, Tennessee. They are inspecting the Psychological Research Unit in the center. Cadets were tested to determine which branch of the service, i.e. bombardiering, navigating, or piloting, they were best fitted to serve.
